24.description: You are in a cold stone cell. The door is made of a solid hardwood, probably oak, which looks like it has been there for many centuries. The floor is more or less bare

33.description: This is the corner office where the guards keep watch

34.description: You are at the end of a narrow stone passageway. There is an exit to the east, along the corridor, to the south, into your jail cell, and to the west into an office

35.description: You are at the corner of a narrow stone passageway.

43.description: You are at the end of a narrow stone passageway

44.description: You are in a dank store room

45.description: You are in a narrow stone passageway.

53.description: You are at the corner of a narrow stone passageway.

54.description: You are in a narrow stone passageway.

55.description: You are at the corner of a narrow stone passageway.
